verbose_text: BAD at Ser 112 is phosphorylated by ribosomal protein S6 kinase alpha-1 (RPS6KA1 / RSK) and cAMP dependent protein kinase [also known as protein kinase A (PKA)]; BAD at Ser 136 is phosphorylated by protein kinase B (PKB / Akt) and BAD at Ser 155 is preferentially phosphorylated by PKA.
evidence: phosphorylated by ribosomal protein S6 kinase alpha-1 (RPS6KA1/RSK) and cAMP-dependent protein kinase
